title: Janna main looking for her ADC main + Thanks to Riot GAMES and players :)
body:
Hey everyone, I'm **Aerie** and haven't posted here for quite a while now. I started playing when Kindred was being teased and have since then fought my way on the damn ladder. Like for real, I don't know how many ranked games I've had, but way too many just to end this season in Gold 5. I'm happy though, as this is my first official season, but as everyone, I want to go further. I've discovered my main champion is Janna{{champion:40}}  and I am looking forward to find an ADC main that is willing to climb the ladder with me. For next season, I'm aiming to reach Platinium, and maybe Diamond the season after, who knows? :)
Anyways, I want to thank all the people I have played with until now, all the trolls{{champion:17}} , the non-trolls, the friends and enemies. Thank you for making the struggle real and the reward more... rewarding. I have a new champion, a skin that goes along with it AND a Gold Banner for my games ascreen :')
Also thank you Rito for the cool game, I'll try to be less salty this next season lol

See ya xoxo

Aerie {{sticker:slayer-jinx-wink}}
